abstract.p: Defense Ministry of Germany says it is 'completely unacceptable' for army instructor to order recruit during target practice to pretend he is facing hostile African-Americans in Bronx; video of order, posted on Internet, draws protest from Bronx Borough Pres Adolfo Carrion Jr, who demands apology (S)

block.p: The Defense Ministry said it was ''completely unacceptable'' for an army instructor to order a recruit during target practice to pretend he was facing hostile African-Americans in the Bronx. A video of the order, posted on the Internet, drew a protest from the Bronx borough president, Adolfo Carri贸n Jr., who demanded an apology. The mayor of Rendsburg, where the base is situated, invited Mr. Carri贸n to visit, saying that he could not excuse the two soldiers but that most of the troops there were ''open-minded and tolerant.''
